subtitle: A perfect accompaniment to a special roast dinner.

method.text: Heat the butter in a pan. Gently fry the onion until just soft.
Add the carrots, parsnips and coriander seeds. Stir and cook for 2-3 min. Add the orange juice. Cover and simmer for 8-12 min until vegetables are tender. Season to taste.
Stir in the chopped parsley before serving.

title: Carrots and parsnips with orange and coriander
